name: AcceptProjectTransfer
description:
Accept a project transfer request on Vercel.

Use this tool to accept a project transfer request that has been initiated by another team on Vercel. This process requires a transfer code, which is generated by the initiating team. Call this tool when you need to finalize the transfer of a project to your team.

parameters.name: project_transfer_code
parameters.description: The unique code of the project transfer request, required to accept the transfer.

value_schema.description: The code of the project transfer request.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The team slug used to perform the project transfer request on behalf of a specific team.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: project_transfer_settings
parameters.description: JSON containing the new project name, paid features, and accepted policies for the transfer.

newProjectName.description: The desired name for the project

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The code of the project transfer request.

value_schema.description: The code of the project transfer request.

newProjectName.description: The desired name for the project
